goods.name: Goods
goods.description: Do you make quilts, pottery, or jewelry that you'd like share? Has your child outgrown his infant clothes?  Goods are anything tangible that you'd like to donate.

services.name: Services
services.description: Do you have a special skill, talent or hobby that you'd like to share with others? Select a service donation and give the gift of your expertise to those who need it.
